page.description: Properties for defining the layout of a Column Layout container.

description.p: An optional class name to assign each column. If you enter a single value, all columns use the same value. If you enter a comma delimited list of class names, the values you enter are applied to the corresponding column.
Enter the width using CSS syntax. If you enter a single value, all columns use that value. If you enter a comma delimited list of widths, the values you enter are applied to the corresponding column.
The line style for the border shown between columns. The line is only shown if the *[ui:Line between columns]* property has been checked.
Defines the space above the column.

section.title: Spacing below bottom of tallest column

description.p: Specify the spacing below the tallest column.

Specify the spacing between columns using CSS syntax (no percentage widths). If you enter a single value, all columns are spaced by the same amount. If you enter a comma delimited list of values, the values entered are applied to the corresponding column.
Specify the width of the container that encloses all of the columns.
Specify if all columns are equal width, or if you want to specify an explicit width for all columns, or each column.

item.name: Equal
item.description: Each column has the same width.

item.name: Explicit
item.description: Each column's width is explicitly defined.
